ca.concordia.advanceprog.ui

Class Surface

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.advanceprog.ui.Surface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Surface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the main element of the game, Surface tends to hold and draw each and every UI elements we have in the game It should be complete over the time Creation of Surface is the common thing between all games and you can find many similar things like this which actually this one is also influenced by a piece of code I found somewhere else.
    Author:
    Shahriar Rostami
